title: Frame drops
body: Be it FPS or just strait frame drops ever since 6.24. Any advice to fix this? Or is it client related?

replies.body: FPS issues can be caused by driver issues or bad game files most of the time.  The steps found in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help fix your issue.  I hope that helps!
